CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(SCC_Case_Category__c, "Complaint - Transaction"), ISPICKVAL(SCC_Case_Category__c, "Complaint - Non-Transaction"), ISPICKVAL(SCC_Case_Category__c, "Fraud / Suspicious Transactions") ), "Complaint", IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(SCC_Case_Category__c, "Platform & Device Support"), ISPICKVAL(SCC_Case_Category__c, "Third Party Support") ), "Support", IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(SCC_Case_Category__c, "Inquiry"), ISPICKVAL(SCC_Case_Category__c, "Products / Promotion Inquiry") ), "Inquiry", IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(SCC_Case_Category__c, "Request"), ISPICKVAL(SCC_Case_Category__c, "Customer Feedback / Sentiment Monitoring") ), "Request", "" ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Kategori Case Utama
